00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00024 #endregion
00025 
00026 namespace Utilities.Web
00027 {
00031     public static class CSS
00032     {
00033         #region Static Public Functions
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public static string StripWhitespace(string Input)
00040         {
00041             Input = Input.Replace("  ", string.Empty);
00042             Input = Input.Replace(System.Environment.NewLine, string.Empty);
00043             Input = Input.Replace("\t", string.Empty);
00044             Input = Input.Replace(" {", "{");
00045             Input = Input.Replace(" :", ":");
00046             Input = Input.Replace(": ", ":");
00047             Input = Input.Replace(", ", ",");
00048             Input = Input.Replace("; ", ";");
00049             Input = Input.Replace(";}", "}");
00050             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @"(?<=[>])\s{2,}(?=[<])|(?<=[>])\s{2,}(?=&nbsp;)|(?<=&ndsp;)\s{2,}(?=[<])", string.Empty);
00051             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "([!{}:;>+([,])s+", "$1");
00052             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "([^;}])}", "$1;}");
00053             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "([s:])(0)(px|em|%|in|cm|mm|pc|pt|ex)", "$1$2");
00054             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, ":0 0 0 0;", ":0;");
00055             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, ":0 0 0;", ":0;");
00056             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, ":0 0;", ":0;");
00057             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "background-position:0;", "background-position:0 0;");
00058             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "(:|s)0+.(d+)", "$1.$2");
00059             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "[^}]+{;}", "");
00060             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "(/" + Regex.Escape("*") + ".*?" + Regex.Escape("*") + "/)", string.Empty);
00061             return Input;
00062         }
00063         #endregion
00064     }
00065 }
